However,  I argue that it cannot solve the problem completely. `ShutdownNow` uses `Thread.interrupt` to try to interrupt the running threads, if a thread does not respond to the interrupt signal, it will never stop even if you call the shutdownNow for multiple times.

```java
Mockito.clearInvocations(invoker1, invoker2, invoker3, invoker4, invoker5);
```
